blogPost.excerpt: Step aside fantasy football! There's a new way to play. Draft members of Congress for your team, score points from their actions, and get the most points during your season to win. Fantasy Congress is a blast with friends, and you might learn a thing or two!
blogPost.body: Step aside fantasy football! There's a new way to play. Draft members of Congress for your team, score points from their actions, and get the most points during your season to win. Fantasy Congress is a blast with friends, and you might learn a thing or two!
blogPost.title: Fantasy Congress - Fantasy sports for U.S. politics
blogPost.author: Allison Seboldt

localize.description: 让开梦幻足球！这是一种新的玩法。为你的球队选拔国会议员，从他们的行动中获得分数，并在你的赛季中获得最多的分数才能获胜。幻想大会是与朋友们的狂欢，你可能会学到一两样东西！
讓開夢幻足球！這是一種新的玩法。爲你的球隊選拔國會議員，從他們的行動中獲得分數，並在你的賽季中獲得最多的分數才能獲勝。幻想大會是與朋友們的狂歡，你可能會學到一兩樣東西！

previous.excerpt: Neverlose.money is the first-ever gamified DeFi protocol that pays a bonus to long-term investors, known as HODLers, using the penalty charge paid by users who fail to HODL.
previous.title: Neverlose.money - A DeFi protocol that lets you invest crypto like Mr. Buffett

localize.description: Neverlose.Money是有史以来第一个游戏化的Defi协议，它向被称为HODLers的长期投资者支付奖金，使用未能Hodl的用户支付的惩罚性费用。
localize.tagline: 一种Defi协议，让你像巴菲特先生一样投资密码

localize.description: Neverlose.Money是有史以來第一個遊戲化的Defi協議，它向被稱爲HODLers的長期投資者支付獎金，使用未能Hodl的用戶支付的懲罰性費用。
localize.tagline: 一種Defi協議，讓你像巴菲特先生一樣投資密碼

next.excerpt: You have to be physically active if you want to live well and longer. Simon Says inspires you to do simple exercises during the day. Join us in the fight against sitting disease.
next.title: Simon Says - Activity Reminder for desk job

localize.description: 如果你想活得更好，活得更长，你就必须进行体育锻炼。西蒙说，这会激励你在白天做简单的锻炼。加入我们与坐姿疾病的斗争吧。
如果你想活得更好，活得更長，你就必須進行體育鍛煉。西蒙說，這會激勵你在白天做簡單的鍛鍊。加入我們與坐姿疾病的鬥爭吧。
